verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David שְׁמַע־ <WH8085> Hear אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> O God קוֹלִ֣י <WH6963> my voice בְשִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> in my prayer מִפַּ֥חַד <WH6343> from fear א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> of the enemy תִּצֹּ֥ר <WH5341> preserve חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> my life

תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <WH5641> Hide מִסּ֣וֹד <WH5475> me from the secret counsel מְרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> of the wicked מֵ֝רִגְשַׁ֗ת <WH7285> from the insurrection פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Who שָׁנְנ֣וּ <WH8150> Who whet כַחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> like a sword לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <WH3956> their tongue דָּרְכ֥וּ <WH1869> [and] bend חִ֝צָּ֗ם <WH2671> [their bows to shoot] their arrows דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> words מָֽר׃ <WH4751> [even] bitter

לִיר֣וֹת <WH3384> That they may shoot בַּמִּסְתָּרִ֣ים <WH4565> in secret תָּ֑ם <WH8535> at the perfect פִּתְאֹ֥ם <WH6597> suddenly יֹ֝רֻ֗הוּ <WH3384> do they shoot וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִירָֽאוּ׃ <WH3372> at him and fear

יְחַזְּקוּ־ <WH2388> They encourage לָ֨מוֹ ׀ דָּ֘בָ֤ר <WH1697> matter רָ֗ע <WH7451> themselves [in] an evil יְֽ֭סַפְּרוּ <WH5608> they commune לִטְמ֣וֹן <WH2934> privily מוֹקְשִׁ֑ים <WH4170> snares אָ֝מְר֗וּ <WH559> they say מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> Who shall see לָּֽמוֹ׃

יַֽחְפְּֽשׂוּ־ <WH2664> They search out עוֹלֹ֗ת <WH5766> iniquities תַּ֭מְנוּ <WH8552> they accomplish חֵ֣פֶשׂ <WH2664> a diligent מְחֻפָּ֑שׂ <WH2665> search וְקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> both the inward אִ֝֗ישׁ <WH376> [thought] of every one וְלֵ֣ב <WH3820> [of them] and the heart עָמֹֽק׃ <WH6013> [is] deep
וַיֹּרֵ֗ם <WH3384> shall shoot אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> But God חֵ֥ץ <WH2671> at them [with] an arrow פִּתְא֑וֹם <WH6597> suddenly הָ֝י֗וּ <WH1961> become מַכּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4347> shall they be wounded

וַיַּכְשִׁיל֣וּהוּ <WH3782> to fall עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <WH5921> is against לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <WH3956> So they shall make their own tongue יִ֝תְנֹדֲד֗וּ <WH5074> them shall flee away כָּל־ <WH3605> All רֹ֥אֵה <WH7200> upon themselves all that see בָֽם׃

וַיִּֽירְא֗וּ <WH3372> shall fear כָּל־ <WH3605> all אָ֫דָ֥ם <WH120> And all men וַ֭יַּגִּידוּ <WH5046> and shall declare פֹּ֥עַל <WH6467> the work אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥הוּ <WH4639> of his doing הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <WH7919> for they shall wisely consider

יִשְׂמַ֬ח <WH8055> shall be glad צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> The righteous בַּ֭יהוָה <WH3069> God וְחָ֣סָה <WH2620> and shall trust ב֑וֹ וְ֝יִתְהַֽלְל֗וּ <WH1984> shall glory כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> in him and all the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in heart
